metaTitle: OASIS GOLF LA FINCA Algorfa | 2-Bed Bungalows from €268,000
metaDescription: OASIS GOLF LA FINCA in Algorfa: Modern 2-bedroom bungalows from €268,000. La Finca Golf resort living. Delivery December 2025. CONTRIMAR developer.

content.heroIntro: Discover OASIS GOLF LA FINCA, an exclusive residential enclave within the prestigious La Finca Golf resort in Algorfa, Alicante. Developed by the trusted CONTRIMAR builder, this collection of modern 2-bedroom bungalows offers the perfect blend of golf lifestyle and Mediterranean living, starting from just €268,000. Each property spans 67m² of thoughtfully designed living space, featuring contemporary finishes, private outdoor areas, and access to world-class golf facilities on your doorstep. With completion scheduled for December 1st, 2025, OASIS GOLF LA FINCA represents an exceptional opportunity for golf enthusiasts, families, and investors seeking quality property in Spain's most sought-after golf destination. The resort welcomes an international community of golf lovers with English spoken throughout, creating a vibrant, cosmopolitan atmosphere while maintaining the tranquility of a private golf community. Located just 15 minutes from the beautiful Guardamar beaches and 20 minutes from modern amenities in Torrevieja, this development offers the perfect balance between exclusive resort living and convenient access to the Costa Blanca's best attractions.

locationSection.intro: La Finca Golf is one of Spain's most prestigious golf communities, situated in the charming village of Algorfa in the heart of Alicante province. This established resort destination has evolved into a thriving international residential community, attracting golf aficionados and discerning property buyers from across Europe. The area is characterized by its peaceful, well-maintained infrastructure, lush landscaping, and championship-standard golf facilities. Algorfa itself offers a authentic Spanish village experience with local restaurants, shops, and services, while remaining just minutes from the bustling towns of Torrevieja and Rojales. The location provides the rare combination of a private, exclusive golf resort environment with easy access to beach towns, shopping centers, and international amenities. Property values in Algorfa have demonstrated consistent growth of 12% year-on-year, making it an increasingly attractive investment destination. The international community at La Finca Golf creates a welcoming environment where English is widely spoken, and residents enjoy a sophisticated lifestyle centered around golf and wellness.
highlights: Airport: 30 min to Alicante International Airport (ALC)
Golf: La Finca Golf Championship Course - on-site
Hospital: Hospital de Torrevieja - 20 min drive
Shopping: Mercadona Rojales - 10 min, Torrevieja shopping centers - 15 min
Restaurants: Village restaurants in Algorfa, resort dining at La Finca Golf
Secondary Golf: Lo Romero, La Marquesa, Vistabella golf courses nearby
Beach Alternative: La Mata beach - 20 min drive
Schools: El Limonar school - 25 min, Torrevieja area schools
Health Center: Local health center in Algorfa village

propertyFeatures.intro: OASIS GOLF LA FINCA bungalows represent the pinnacle of contemporary Spanish residential design, built by CONTRIMAR to exacting standards of quality and durability. Each 67m² property has been meticulously planned to maximize natural light, efficient living spaces, and seamless indoor-outdoor connectivity. The developer employs premium construction materials, including thermal-break double glazing, quality ceramic flooring, and modern fixtures throughout. These homes are designed for both primary residences and investment purposes, with excellent rental potential in the thriving golf tourism market. Every detail reflects CONTRIMAR's commitment to quality construction and buyer satisfaction.
features: Communal swimming pool with resort amenities
Double glazing with thermal break technology

content.investmentSection: OASIS GOLF LA FINCA offers compelling investment fundamentals in one of Spain's most resilient property markets. Algorfa property values have appreciated 12% year-on-year, significantly outpacing broader market trends. With purchase prices at approximately €1,600/m² - approximately 50% lower than comparable coastal towns - these bungalows represent exceptional value. The rental market remains robust, with golf resort properties commanding €900 per week in peak season, delivering 7-9% annual yields for investors. The international clientele at La Finca Golf ensures consistent demand for both short-term holiday rentals and long-term leases. CONTRIMAR's reputation and the established golf community create a stable investment environment. Whether seeking a holiday home, primary residence, or rental investment, OASIS GOLF LA FINCA provides multiple pathways to financial return while enjoying Mediterranean lifestyle benefits.
whyBuySection: Strategic location within La Finca Golf Championship resort
Established CONTRIMAR developer with proven track record

Competitive pricing at 50% less than coastal alternatives

Low-density, exclusive community with security systems

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in OASIS GOLF LA FINCA?
faqs.answer: OASIS GOLF LA FINCA bungalows start from €268,000 for 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom units of 67m². This represents approximately €1,600/m², which is competitive pricing for the La Finca Golf community. Contact us for current availability and package options.

faqs.question: When will OASIS GOLF LA FINCA be completed?
faqs.answer: The project is scheduled for completion on December 1st, 2025. CONTRIMAR provides a 10-year structural warranty on all properties. We recommend contacting us for precise delivery schedules and payment plan options aligned with construction milestones.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of OASIS GOLF LA FINCA?
faqs.answer: CONTRIMAR is the developer, an established builder with significant experience in Algorfa and the Alicante region. They specialize in quality residential developments and maintain high standards in construction, materials, and customer service.

faqs.question: Is Algorfa a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, Algorfa is an excellent property market. Property values appreciate at 12% year-on-year, and prices are 50% lower than coastal towns. The international golf community creates a vibrant, English-speaking environment. You have easy access to Hospital de Torrevieja (20 min), beautiful Guardamar beaches (15 min), and world-class golf facilities. The established infrastructure and growing rental market make it ideal for both lifestyle and investment buyers.

faqs.question: How far is OASIS GOLF LA FINCA from the beach?
faqs.answer: OASIS GOLF LA FINCA is just 15 minutes by car to Guardamar beaches, known for pristine sand and clear waters. La Mata beach is 20 minutes away. This proximity allows residents to enjoy Mediterranean beach lifestyle while maintaining access to the exclusive golf resort environment.

faqs.question: What golf courses are near OASIS GOLF LA FINCA?
faqs.answer: La Finca Golf Championship Course is located on-site within the resort, offering immediate walking access. Additional courses nearby include Lo Romero, La Marquesa, and Vistabella. The area is internationally recognized as a premier golf destination, with some of Spain's most respected courses within 10-15 minutes.

faqs.question: What amenities are near OASIS GOLF LA FINCA?
faqs.answer: Nearby amenities include: La Finca Golf Championship Course (on-site), Mercadona supermarket in Rojales (10 min), Hospital de Torrevieja (20 min), local shops in Algorfa village, El Limonar school (25 min), Guardamar beaches (15 min), and numerous restaurants in both the resort and surrounding villages. Shopping centers in Torrevieja are 15 minutes away.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for OASIS GOLF LA FINCA properties?
faqs.answer: Golf resort properties in this area typically achieve €900 per week in rental income during peak season, translating to 7-9% annual yields. The international golf community and proximity to beaches create consistent demand for both holiday rentals and long-term leases, making these properties attractive for investor returns.

content.conclusion: OASIS GOLF LA FINCA represents a rare opportunity to acquire a quality modern home in one of Spain's most prestigious golf communities at an accessible price point. Developed by trusted CONTRIMAR, these 2-bedroom bungalows combine contemporary living with exclusive resort amenities, delivering exceptional value in a market appreciating 12% annually. Whether you seek a Mediterranean golf escape, primary residence with investment potential, or a diversified property portfolio, OASIS GOLF LA FINCA offers the ideal solution. The international community, English-speaking environment, pristine beaches 15 minutes away, and world-class golf facilities create an unparalleled lifestyle opportunity. With completion in December 2025 and competitive pricing from €268,000, limited units remain available. Contact us today via WhatsApp to discuss payment options, reserve your property, and begin your La Finca Golf lifestyle experience. Our expert team is ready to guide you through every step of the purchasing process.
